message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.SY. 

The paper presents a spike-based model for pattern classification using active dendrites and a learning algorithm inspired by structural plasticity in biological neurons. This work is relevant to the fields of neural networks (cs.NE), machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision (cs.CV), and systems and control (cs.SY) due to its focus on developing a hardware-friendly learning algorithm for pattern classification.
